summary: Jeon Woo-chi, an undisciplined womanizing Taoist from the Joseon era, ends up in present day Korea causing mayhem with his knack for magic.
cast: Dong-won Gang|Soo-jung Lim|Yoon-seok Kim|Hae-Jin Yoo|Young-chang Song|Sang-ho Kim|Woo-seon Seon|Jeong-hwan Kong|Nam-Hee Park|Tae-won Kwon|Bang Kil-Seung|Ji-min Kim|Ki-Cheon Kim|Yeon-su Seo|Yeong-jin Sin|Jong-gu Yun|Gyo-sik Choi|Do-bin Baek|Yun-shik Baek|Park Ji-Yeon|Choi Jin-ho|Hyo-jin Kim|Dae-ro Lee|Mi-do Lee|Ji-hyeok Min|Min-Gyu Park|Soo-Young Park|Jeon Sang-Jin|Hyeon-woo Son|Jung-ah Yum
title: Woochi. Cazador de demonios
